name: 4th Annual Peptides Congress 2017
content: Oxford Global Conferences are proud to announce the 4th Annual Peptides Congress, taking place on 24 â€“ 25 April 2017 in London, UK. This highly anticipated conference provides a unique opportunity for over 400 senior-level delegates to engage in scientific discussions about the current research results and latest advancements that help the industry going forward.Over 25 presentations and case studies focusing on the key advancements in peptides technologies, chemistry, formulation & delivery as well as peptide therapeutics Two-day interactive conference addressing three main themes: - Recent Progress in Peptide Technologies & Manufacturing - Peptide Discovery & Development: Peptide Chemistry, Formulation & Delivery - Advances in Peptide Therapeutics Co-located with the 10th Annual Proteins & Antibodies Congress, the event will have 14 pre-scheduled one to one meetings, exhibition and informal networking opportunities
